PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DoorCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcDoor.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), Also referred to as "construction type". It should be provided as an alternative to the name of the "object type", if the software does not support object types and no classification reference to a recognized classification system used.IFC4.3.0.0 DEPRECATION The Reference property is deprecated and shall no longer be used, use attribute Name on the relating type instead.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PropertyDef.Name: FireRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Fire rating for this object. It is given according to the national fire safety classification.

PropertyDef.Name: AcousticRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Acoustic rating for this object. It is provided according to the national building code. It indicates the sound transmission resistance of this object by an index ratio (instead of providing full sound absorption values).

PropertyDef.Name: SecurityRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Index based rating system indicating security level. It is giving according to the national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: DurabilityRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Durability against mechanical stress. It is given according to the national code or regulation.

PropertyDef.Name: HygrothermalRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Resistance against hygrothermal impact from different temperatures and humidities inside and outside. It is given according to the national code or regulation.

PropertyDef.Name: WaterTightnessRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Water tightness rating for this object. It is provided according to the national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: MechanicalLoadRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Mechanical load rating for this object. It is provided according to the national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: WindLoadRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Wind load resistance rating for this object. It is provided according to the national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: Infiltration
PropertyDef.Definition: Infiltration flowrate of outside air for the filler object based on the area of the filler object at a pressure level of 50 Pascals. It shall be used, if the length of all joints is unknown.

PropertyDef.Name: IsExternal
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the element is designed for use in the exterior (TRUE) or not (FALSE). If (TRUE) it is an external element and faces the outside of the building.

PropertyDef.Name: ThermalTransmittance
PropertyDef.Definition: Thermal transmittance coefficient (U-Value) of an element, within the direction of the thermal flow (including all materials).

PropertyDef.Name: GlazingAreaFraction
PropertyDef.Definition: Fraction of the glazing area relative to the total area of the filling element. It shall be used, if the glazing area is not given separately for all panels within the filling element.

PropertyDef.Name: HandicapAccessible
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication that this object is designed to be accessible by the handicapped. Set to (TRUE) if this object is rated as handicap accessible according the local building codes, otherwise (FALSE). It is giving according to the requirements of the national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: FireExit
PropertyDef.Definition:
Indication whether this object is designed to serve as an exit in the case of fire (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Here it defines an exit door in accordance to the national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: HasDrive
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether this object has an automatic drive to operate it (TRUE) or no drive (FALSE)

PropertyDef.Name: SelfClosing
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether this object is designed to close automatically after use (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: SmokeStop
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the object is designed to provide a smoke stop (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
